metadata.title: CVE-2021-20300 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in OpenEXR's hufUncompress functionality inOpenEXR/IlmImf/ImfHuf.cpp. This flaw allows an attacker who can submit acrafted file that is processed by OpenEXR, to trigger an integer overflow.The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

criterions.comment: openexr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
